content:
AmbientTheme Class

In this Article

Provides the look and feel property settings to a top-level workflow in a design-time environment.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
public class AmbientTheme : System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme
  • AmbientTheme

Inherited Members

,

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface. This includes any background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface. An ambient theme contains the default display properties for the workflow design surface. It provides settings to be used across the entire design surface (for example, the grid, background and foreground colors, read-only designer color, and so on). It can use either user-selected values or the values from the operational system.

Constructors summary

AmbientTheme(WorkflowTheme)

Initializes a new instance of the AmbientTheme class by using a WorkflowTheme.

Properties summary

BackColor

Gets or sets the ambient back color on a workflow design surface.
BackgroundBrush

Gets the ambient brush used to fill graphical shapes displayed on the workflow design surface.
BoldFont

Gets the ambient bold font setting for the workflow design surface.
BorderWidth

Gets the ambient border width for objects that are placed onto the workflow design surface.
CommentIndicatorBrush

Gets the ambient brush associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
CommentIndicatorColor

Gets or sets the ambient color associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
CommentIndicatorPen

Gets the ambient pen associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
DesignerSize

Gets or sets the ambient size settings for activity designers on the workflow design surface.
DrawGrayscale

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws grayscales.
DrawRounded

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws rounded shapes.
DrawShadow

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws shadows.
DropIndicatorBrush

Gets the ambient brush associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.
DropIndicatorColor

Gets or sets the ambient color associated with an object that you drags onto the workflow design surface.
DropIndicatorPen

Gets the ambient pen associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.
Font

Gets the ambient font settings for the workflow design surface.
FontName

Gets or sets the ambient font name for the workflow design surface.
ForeColor

Gets or sets the ambient fore color property for the workflow design surface.
ForegroundBrush

Gets the ambient foreground brush for the workflow design surface.
ForegroundPen

Gets the ambient foreground pen for the workflow design surface.
GlyphSize

Gets the ambient height and width of glyphs on the workflow design surface.
GridColor

Gets or sets the ambient grid color for the workflow design surface.
GridSize

Gets the ambient size of the grid to display on the workflow design surface.
GridStyle

Gets or sets the ambient grid style for the workflow design surface.
MajorGridBrush

Gets the ambient brush settings for major grids on the workflow design surface.
MajorGridPen

Gets the ambient pen settings for major grids on the workflow design surface.
Margin

Gets the ambient margin settings for the workflow design surface.
MinorGridPen

Gets the ambient pen settings for minor grids on the workflow design surface.
ReadonlyIndicatorBrush

Gets the ambient brush used to fill graphical shapes associated with read-only items displayed on the workflow design surface.
ReadonlyIndicatorColor

Gets or sets the ambient color for read-only items on the workflow design surface.
SelectionForeColor

Gets or sets the ambient color for selected items on the workflow design surface.
SelectionForegroundBrush

Gets the ambient foreground brush used to fill graphical shapes associated with selected items displayed on the workflow design surface.
SelectionForegroundPen

Gets the ambient foreground pen settings for selected items on the workflow design surface.
SelectionPatternColor

Gets or sets the ambient pattern color for items that you select on the workflow design surface.
SelectionPatternPen

Gets the ambient pen settings for the pattern associated with selected items on the workflow design surface.
SelectionSize

Gets the ambient size of a selected item on the workflow design surface.
ShowConfigErrors

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow design surface displays configuration errors.
ShowDesignerBorder

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the workflow design surface displays designer borders.
ShowGrid

Gets or sets a value indicating whether grids will be shown on the workflow design surface.
TextQuality

Gets or sets the text quality to display on the workflow design surface.
UseOperatingSystemSettings

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the AmbientTheme uses the theme settings of the operating system.
WatermarkAlignment

Gets or sets the ambient alignment settings for watermark images on the workflow design surface.
WatermarkImagePath

Gets or sets the ambient path to the image to display as a watermark on the workflow design surface.
WorkflowWatermarkImage

Gets the ambient image to associate with the workflow design surface as its watermark.

Methods summary

Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources used by the AmbientTheme and optionally releases the managed resources.
Initialize()

Performs additional initialization tasks for the AmbientTheme class that are not performed by the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.#ctor*.
OnAmbientPropertyChanged(AmbientProperty)

Notifies the AmbientTheme when the value of the AmbientProperty enumeration changes.

Constructors

  • AmbientTheme(WorkflowTheme)

    Initializes a new instance of the AmbientTheme class by using a WorkflowTheme.

    public AmbientTheme (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme theme);

    Parameters

    • theme
      WorkflowTheme

      The WorkflowTheme with which the ambient theme is associated.

Properties

  • BackColor

    Gets or sets the ambient back color on a workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Color BackColor { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Color

      A Color value that represents the ambient background color. The default is white.

    Remarks

    When you set the BackColor property, it negates the BackgroundBrush property value.

  • BackgroundBrush

    Gets the ambient brush used to fill graphical shapes displayed on the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Brush BackgroundBrush { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A Brush value that represents the background brush of the workflow on a design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a SolidBrush with its color set to the current BackColor property value.

  • BoldFont

    Gets the ambient bold font setting for the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Font BoldFont { get; }

    Property Value

    • Font

      A Font value that determines whether the text on the workflow design surface is bold.

  • BorderWidth

    Gets the ambient border width for objects that are placed onto the workflow design surface.

    public virtual int BorderWidth { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      An integer that represents the border width of objects placed on the workflow design surface.

  • CommentIndicatorBrush

    Gets the ambient brush associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Brush CommentIndicatorBrush { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A Brush that is associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a SolidBrush with its color set to the current CommentIndicatorColor property value.

  • CommentIndicatorColor

    Gets or sets the ambient color associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Color CommentIndicatorColor { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Color

      A Color value that is associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.

  • CommentIndicatorPen

    Gets the ambient pen associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Pen CommentIndicatorPen { get; }

    Property Value

    • Pen

      A Pen value that is associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) by default it will return a Pen with its color set to the current CommentIndicatorColor property value and its width set to 1.

  • DesignerSize

    Gets or sets the ambient size settings for activity designers on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerSize DesignerSize { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • DesignerSize

      A DesignerSize enumeration value that determines the size of activity designers on the workflow design surface. The default value is DesignerSize.

  • DrawGrayscale

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws grayscales.

    public virtual bool DrawGrayscale { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the ambient theme associated with the workflow draws grayscales; otherwise, false. The default is false.

  • DrawRounded

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws rounded shapes.

    public virtual bool DrawRounded { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the ambient theme associated with the workflow draws rounded shapes; otherwise, false. The default is true.

  • DrawShadow

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws shadows.

    public virtual bool DrawShadow { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the ambient theme associated with the workflow draws shadows; otherwise, false. The default is false.

  • DropIndicatorBrush

    Gets the ambient brush associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Brush DropIndicatorBrush { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A Brush associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) by default it will return a SolidBrush with its color set to the current DropIndicatorColor property value.

  • DropIndicatorColor

    Gets or sets the ambient color associated with an object that you drags onto the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Color DropIndicatorColor { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Color

      A Color value associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.

  • DropIndicatorPen

    Gets the ambient pen associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Pen DropIndicatorPen { get; }

    Property Value

    • Pen

      A Pen associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a Pen with its color set to the current DropIndicatorColor property value and its width set to the BorderWidth property.

  • Font

    Gets the ambient font settings for the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Font Font { get; }

    Property Value

    • Font

      A Font that represents the ambient font settings for the workflow design surface.

  • FontName

    Gets or sets the ambient font name for the workflow design surface.

    public virtual string FontName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that represents the ambient font name for the workflow design surface.

  • ForeColor

    Gets or sets the ambient fore color property for the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Color ForeColor { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Color

      A Color value that represents the ambient fore color for the workflow design surface.

  • ForegroundBrush

    Gets the ambient foreground brush for the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Brush ForegroundBrush { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A Brush value that represents the ambient foreground brush.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a SolidBrush with its color set to the current ForeColor property value.

  • ForegroundPen

    Gets the ambient foreground pen for the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Pen ForegroundPen { get; }

    Property Value

    • Pen

      A Pen value that represents the ambient foreground pen.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a Pen with its color set to the current DropIndicatorColor property value, its width set to 1, and its DashStyle property set to System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle.

  • GlyphSize

    Gets the ambient height and width of glyphs on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Size GlyphSize { get; }

    Property Value

    • Size

      A Size value that represents the ambient height and width of glyphs on the workflow design surface.

    Example

    The following code example demonstrates a common way you can access the GlyphSize property from a class that derives from the DesignerGlyph class.

    This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DatabaseService.cs file. For more information, see Workflow Monitor. 

    public override Rectangle GetBounds(ActivityDesigner designer, bool activated)
{
    Rectangle imageBounds = Rectangle.Empty;
    Image image = Resources.Executing;
    if (image != null)
    {
        Size glyphSize = WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme.AmbientTheme.GlyphSize;
        imageBounds.Location = new Point(designer.Bounds.Right - glyphSize.Width / 2, designer.Bounds.Top - glyphSize.Height / 2);
        imageBounds.Size = glyphSize;
    }
    return imageBounds;
}

    Public Overrides Function GetBounds(ByVal designer As System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner, ByVal activated As Boolean) As System.Drawing.Rectangle
    Dim imageBounds As Rectangle = Rectangle.Empty
    Dim image As Image = AppResources.Executing
    If Not image Is Nothing Then
        Dim glyphSize As Size = WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme.AmbientTheme.GlyphSize
        imageBounds.Location = New Point(designer.Bounds.Right - glyphSize.Width / 2, designer.Bounds.Top - glyphSize.Height / 2)
        imageBounds.Size = glyphSize
    End If
    Return imageBounds
End Function
  • GridColor

    Gets or sets the ambient grid color for the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Color GridColor { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Color

      A Color value that represents the grid color for the workflow design surface.

  • GridSize

    Gets the ambient size of the grid to display on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Size GridSize { get; }

    Property Value

    • Size

      A Size value that represents the height and width of the grid to display on the workflow design surface.

  • GridStyle

    Gets or sets the ambient grid style for the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle GridStyle { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • DashStyle

      A DashStyle value that represents the dash style for the grid. The default setting is DashStyle.

  • MajorGridBrush

    Gets the ambient brush settings for major grids on the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Brush MajorGridBrush { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A Brush associated with the major grid on the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a SolidBrush with its color set to the current GridColor property value.

  • MajorGridPen

    Gets the ambient pen settings for major grids on the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Pen MajorGridPen { get; }

    Property Value

    • Pen

      A Pen associated with the major grid on the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a Pen with its color set to the current GridColor property value, its width set to 1, and its DashStyle property set to DashStyle.

  • Margin

    Gets the ambient margin settings for the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Size Margin { get; }

    Property Value

    • Size

      A Size that represents the margin settings on the workflow design surface.

  • MinorGridPen

    Gets the ambient pen settings for minor grids on the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Pen MinorGridPen { get; }

    Property Value

    • Pen

      A Pen associated with the minor grid on the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a Pen with its color calculated based on the current GridColor property value, its width set to 1, and its DashStyle property set to System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle.

  • ReadonlyIndicatorBrush

    Gets the ambient brush used to fill graphical shapes associated with read-only items displayed on the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Brush ReadonlyIndicatorBrush { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A Brush that represents the brush associated with read-only items on the workflow on a design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a SolidBrush object with its color set to the current ReadonlyIndicatorColor property value.

  • ReadonlyIndicatorColor

    Gets or sets the ambient color for read-only items on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Color ReadonlyIndicatorColor { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Color

      A Color value that represents the ambient color for read-only items on the workflow design surface.

  • SelectionForeColor

    Gets or sets the ambient color for selected items on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Color SelectionForeColor { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Color

      A Color value that represents the ambient color for read-only items on the workflow design surface.

  • SelectionForegroundBrush

    Gets the ambient foreground brush used to fill graphical shapes associated with selected items displayed on the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Brush SelectionForegroundBrush { get; }

    Property Value

    • Brush

      A Brush that represents the brush associated with read-only items on the workflow on a design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a SolidBrush object with its color set to the current SelectionForeColor property value.

  • SelectionForegroundPen

    Gets the ambient foreground pen settings for selected items on the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Pen SelectionForegroundPen { get; }

    Property Value

    • Pen

      A Pen associated with the foreground of selected items on the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) by default it will return a Pen with its color set to the current SelectionForeColor property value and its width set to 1.

  • SelectionPatternColor

    Gets or sets the ambient pattern color for items that you select on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Color SelectionPatternColor { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Color

      A Color value that represents the ambient pattern color for items that you select on the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    If SelectionPatternPen is not null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) when you set SelectionPatternColor, SelectionPatternColor will dispose of any resources used by SelectionPatternPen and set it to null (Nothing).

  • SelectionPatternPen

    Gets the ambient pen settings for the pattern associated with selected items on the workflow design surface.

    public System.Drawing.Pen SelectionPatternPen { get; }

    Property Value

    • Pen

      A Pen associated with the pattern of selected items on the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    If this property contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), by default it will return a Pen with its color set to the current SelectionPatternColor property value, its width set to 1, and its DashStyle property set to System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle.

  • SelectionSize

    Gets the ambient size of a selected item on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Drawing.Size SelectionSize { get; }

    Property Value

    • Size

      A Size that represents the ambient property settings for selected items on the workflow design surface.

  • ShowConfigErrors

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow design surface displays configuration errors.

    public virtual bool ShowConfigErrors { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the workflow design surface is to display configuration errors; otherwise, false. The default is true.

    Example

    The following code example demonstrates how you can set ShowConfigErrors to false. Doing this for a workflow design surface means that none of the ActivityDesigner objects displayed on the design surface will display their associated DesignerAction objects.

    This code example is part of the Tracking Profile Designer SDK Sample from the WorkflowDesignerControl.cs file. For more information, see Tracking Profile Designer Sample. 

    public WorkflowDesignerControl()
{
    InitializeComponent();
    
    WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme.ReadOnly = false;
    WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme.AmbientTheme.ShowConfigErrors = false;
    WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme.ReadOnly = true;            
}



    Public Sub New()
    InitializeComponent()

    WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme.ReadOnly = False
    WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme.AmbientTheme.ShowConfigErrors = False
    WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme.ReadOnly = True
End Sub
  • ShowDesignerBorder

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether the workflow design surface displays designer borders.

    public virtual bool ShowDesignerBorder { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the workflow design surface displays designer borders; otherwise, false. The default is true.

  • ShowGrid

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether grids will be shown on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual bool ShowGrid { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if grids will be displayed on the workflow design surface; otherwise, false. The default is false.

  • TextQuality

    Gets or sets the text quality to display on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality TextQuality { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TextQuality

      A TextQuality that specifies the text quality settings to use on the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    TextQuality allows you to determine whether the text displayed on a workflow design surface, and all its child designers, is anti-aliased or aliased. Anti-aliased text provides higher quality text display, while aliased text requires fewer resources to maintain.

  • UseOperatingSystemSettings

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether the AmbientTheme uses the theme settings of the operating system.

    public virtual bool UseOperatingSystemSettings { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the AmbientTheme uses theme settings of the operating system; otherwise, false. The default is false.

  • WatermarkAlignment

    Gets or sets the ambient alignment settings for watermark images on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment WatermarkAlignment { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • DesignerContentAlignment

      A DesignerContentAlignment that specifies the ambient alignment settings for watermark images on the workflow design surface. The default is DesignerContentAlignment.

  • WatermarkImagePath

    Gets or sets the ambient path to the image to display as a watermark on the workflow design surface.

    public virtual string WatermarkImagePath { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the ambient path to the image to display as a watermark on the workflow design surface. The default is an empty string.

    Remarks

    Use WatermarkImagePath to associate an image as a watermark image for a workflow design surface. If WatermarkImagePath is not null (Nothing in Visual Basic) when you set WatermarkImagePath, WatermarkImagePath disposes of any resources used by WatermarkImagePath and sets its value to null (Nothing).

  • WorkflowWatermarkImage

    Gets the ambient image to associate with the workflow design surface as its watermark.

    public System.Drawing.Image WorkflowWatermarkImage { get; }

    Property Value

    • Image

      An Image to use as a watermark on the workflow design surface.

    Remarks

    Use WatermarkImagePath to associate an image as a watermark image for a workflow design surface. If WatermarkImagePath is not null (Nothing in Visual Basic) when you set WatermarkImagePath, WatermarkImagePath disposes of any resources used by WatermarkImagePath and sets its value to null (Nothing).

Methods

  • Dispose(Boolean)

    Releases the unmanaged resources used by the AmbientTheme and optionally releases the managed resources.

    protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);

    Parameters

    • disposing
      Boolean

      true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

  • Initialize()

    Performs additional initialization tasks for the AmbientTheme class that are not performed by the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.#ctor*.

    public override void Initialize ();

    Remarks

    If UseOperatingSystemSettings returns true, Initialize sets all AmbientTheme properties to the values defined by the operating system.

  • OnAmbientPropertyChanged(AmbientProperty)

    Notifies the AmbientTheme when the value of the AmbientProperty enumeration changes.

    public override void OnAmbientPropertyChanged (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty ambientProperty);

    Parameters

    • ambientProperty
      AmbientProperty

      The AmbientProperty enumeration value to which the setting was changed.

    Remarks

    AmbientProperty specifies the source of ambient theme properties for classes that inherit from the DesignerTheme class. The two possible sources are the operating system and the designer-specified settings.
